scripts.start: muse-cra-patch && cross-env NODE_PATH=./node_modules PORT=3035 craco start
scripts.build:dev: muse-cra-patch && cross-env NODE_PATH=./node_modules NODE_ENV=development  FAST_REFRESH=false craco build
scripts.build:test: muse-cra-patch && cross-env NODE_PATH=./node_modules NODE_ENV=development MUSE_TEST_BUILD=true FAST_REFRESH=false craco build
scripts.test: muse-cra-patch && cross-env NODE_PATH=./node_modules NODE_ENV=development MUSE_TEST_BUILD=true craco test --ci --watchAll=false --passWithNoTests --coverage
scripts.test:dev: muse-cra-patch && cross-env NODE_PATH=./node_modules NODE_ENV=development MUSE_TEST_BUILD=true craco test --coverage
scripts.test:config: muse-cra-patch && cross-env NODE_PATH=./node_modules NODE_ENV=development MUSE_TEST_BUILD=true craco test --showConfig
scripts.deploy: pnpm build && pnpm build:dev && muse release && muse deploy nateapp staging
